SELECT id, name, code, description, order_num, enabled, create_time, update_time FROM subject WHERE enabled = TRUE ORDER BY order_num ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subject (name, code, description, order_num, enabled) VALUES (#{name}, #{code}, #{description}, #{orderNum}, #{enabled})
mapper.update: UPDATE subject SET name = #{name}, code = #{code}, description = #{description}, order_num = #{orderNum}, enabled = #{enabled} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.name, s.code, s.description, s.order_num AS orderNum, s.enabled, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM exam_question eq WHERE eq.subject_id = s.id) AS questionCount FROM subject s WHERE s.enabled = TRUE ORDER BY s.order_num ASC
